qa_library.answer: Niche job boards + strong LinkedIn + proof-of-work with each application; async communication skills highlight karo.

qa_library.title: Zapier-like system design
qa_library.answer: Trigger + steps (actions) with step index; queue + worker model; dynamic imports for app actions.
